        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/categories",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Category>> getCategories()
        method which gets the GET-request and calls the categoryBusiness method queries all categories in the neo4j database
        Returns:
        a list of all categories

      • postCategory

        @CrossOrigin
 @Transactional
 @RequestMapping(value="/categories",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Long> postCategory(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                Category category)
                                                                                                                                                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        method which gets the POST-request and calls the categoryBusiness method creates a new category in the neo4j database
        Returns:
        the neo4j ID of the new category or 0L if name already exists
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getCategoriesNames

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/categories/name-list",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getCategoriesNames()
        method which gets the GET-request and calls the categoryBusiness method queries all names of categories in the neo4j database
        Returns:
        a list of all names of categories as strings

 @RequestMapping(value="/categories/{categoryId}",

                                                                                                                                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
